title: Adjuvant anlotinib plus TACE in hepatocellular carcinoma with postoperative high-risk recurrence: a single-arm, multi-center, phase II study.
abstract: This study assessed the efficacy and safety of anlotinib plus transcatheter arterial chemoembolization (TACE) as adjuvant therapy in hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) at high-risk recurrence after resection.
journal: Clinical & translational oncology : official publication of the Federation of Spanish Oncology Societies and of the National Cancer Institute of Mexico
keywords: High risk of recurrence after surgery
